thread.title: You'll soon be able to remap buttons on your Xbox One controller

title: You'll soon be able to remap buttons on your Xbox One controller
text:
You'll soon be able to remap buttons on your Xbox One controller 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Microsoft's Mike Ybarra has revealed that button remap is coming to all Xbox One controllers shortly. The feature will make its debut on the...
